name: Straw Hat Pirates
description: Pirates led by Luffy, known for their adventures and pursuit of the One Piece. The crew members each have unique talents and powerful abilities.

name: Red-Haired Pirates
description: Crew led by Shanks, one of the Four Emperors. Known for their high combat skills and Shanks' immense Haki.

name: Blackbeard Pirates
description: Notorious and dangerous crew led by Blackbeard, the only pirate known to possess two Devil Fruit powers.

name: Big Mom Pirates
description: Powerful crew led by Big Mom, one of the Four Emperors, with many members who are her own children.

name: Beast Pirates
description: Crew led by Kaido, another of the Four Emperors, known for their army of Zoan Devil Fruit users and formidable strength.

name: Whitebeard Pirates
description: Once led by Whitebeard, one of the most powerful pirates, known for protecting territories and powerful allies.

name: Heart Pirates
description: A crew of pirate doctors led by Law, known for his tactical skills and the use of the Ope Ope no Mi.

name: Kid Pirates
description: Crew led by the ruthless pirate Kid, known for his ambition and rivalry with the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Sun Pirates
description: Crew composed of Fish-Men, originally formed by Fisher Tiger to fight against human oppression, later led by Jinbe.

name: Roger Pirates
description: The legendary crew that reached the last island, Raftel, and discovered the One Piece. Disbanded after Rogerâ€™s execution.

name: Marines
description: The World Government's military force tasked with enforcing law and order. Known for their strict justice, they possess powerful fighters including Admirals.

name: Revolutionary Army
description: An army led by Dragon, Luffy's father, aiming to overthrow the World Government. Known for its secrecy and strong, loyal members.
